name: Senior Ruby on Rails Developer (Germany, Schwäbisch Gmünd)
description:
A large telecom solution provider is looking for a Ruby on Rails Developer.

The company provides everything related to the Internet, telephony and television, taking care of authentication, authorization, accounting and availability of services.

You are offered to work in the company's office located in Schwäbisch Gmünd, Germany.

Your tasks:

  • Frontend development and creation of databases in Rails and Javascript
  • Programming of applications for internet service providers
  • Development of the automation platforms - also in other programming languages such as Javascript or Perl
  • Designing and implementing web services
  • Test-driven software development (TDD) with RSpec and Capybara

Requirements:

  • 3+ years of experience as a RoR Developer
  • Profound knowledge of Internet technologies and protocols
  • Knowledge of relational database systems (PostgresSQL)
  • Experience with Linux as a development environment and server
  • English B2+

The company offers you:

  • Decent salary from 6200 EUR gross
  • Relocation support to Germany
  • Open corporate culture, quick decision making
  • Working in a fast-growing company of professionals
  • Opportunities for professional growth
